msg.msgText: Enabled Specify if external LDAP is enabled. The valid values are True and False. The default value is True. URL URL to connect to the LDAP server, including protocol. BindDN Distinguished name to use when binding to LDAP. For anonymous bind, leave blank. BindPassword Password to use when binding to LDAP. For anonymous bind, leave blank. MaxConnections This function has been deprecated as of MessageSight 1.2.0.1. Timeout Timeout for LDAP calls in seconds. The valid values are from 1 to 60. The default value is 10. EnableCache Specify if authentication result should be cached. The valid values are True and False The default value is True. CacheTimeout Authentication result cache time to live in seconds. The valid values are from 1 to 60. The default value is 10. GroupCacheTimeout Group cache time to live in seconds. The valid values are from 1 to 86400. The default value is 300. IgnoreCase Whether to ignore case or not for LDAP search. The value values are True and False. The default value is True. BaseDN Base distinguished name. UserSuffix User distinguished name suffix to search for. If not specified, search for the user distinguished name using the UserIdMap, then bind with that distinguished name. GroupSuffix Group distinguished name suffix. UserIdMap User LDAP Object ID map. GroupIdMap Group LDAP Object ID map. GroupMemberIdMap Group Member attribute ID Map. NestedGroupSearch Whether to perform nested group search when searching for group membership of a user. The valid values are True and False The default value is False.

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
